original: If you need a little humor and a lot of drinks in your life, Split Sides at Star Junction in Algonquin is the perfect place to unwind and laugh till you shit yourself.  Grab a table, order some drinks and get ready with your best drunken heckles as the hottest international stand-up comedians like Ricky Gervais, Gaylord Menzies, J. Jones, John "Not Funny" Johns and Katt Williams have been known to pop by.  It's the stage that has propelled many a rebellious star into syndicated family sitcoms, then rehab.  Laugh at them or with them - it's up to you.
translated: 如果你想来上一点幽默，喝上几杯饮料，位于Algonquin星汇广场的Split Sides喜剧俱乐部就很合适，可以在里面尽情放松，笑掉大牙。找张桌子，点杯饮料，准备好用醉醺醺的腔调接喜剧大咖的话茬，包括Ricky Gervais、Gaylord Menzies、J. Jones、John「无趣」Johns和Katt Williams在内的全球大牌喜剧演员都来过这儿。这个舞台将许多叛逆的明星送进了畅销的家庭情景剧，之后再送进戒毒所。是嘲笑他们还是陪他们笑，由你决定。
